display_long_description:
Death Flags is a VR on-rails shooter that blends frantic action with a cinematic narrative. Fight your way through chaotic environments and survive waves of cursed pirates, each with unique abilities that test your aim and reflexes. The scoring and combo system rewards precision and speed: chain perfect shots, multiply your score, and unlock power-ups that make every stage more intense and replayable.

Your escape takes you across Fishbone Island, from coastal villages and burning bazaars to the imposing citadel of King Viktor. Each stage offers alternative routes and a replayable progression system with extra difficulties and challenges for players who want to push their limits.

Face a cursed crew: gunslingers, swordsmen, kamikazes, and minigun-wielding brutes twisted by darkness. Every enemy has unique resistances and tactics, while epic bosses will test everything you’ve learned.

Combat evolves with special magazines (explosive, poisonous, piercing, freezing, and more) that transform the behavior of your pistols and let you adapt your playstyle each run. Add health, time, and power items to survive brutal waves, and unleash legendary power-ups like invincibility, double damage, or the devastating Pirate Fury mode. On top of that, VR customization lets you equip skins and cosmetic accessories for your hands, making every experience unique.

Death Flags is your gateway to a saga of action, fantasy, and betrayal in a cursed world.
